summary:
New Version compatible with Realistic Lighting Overhaul.
‘Climates of Tamriel’ edition will follow although it works it just needs a few more tweaks.
descriptionHtml:
New World ENB V3.

Required files are the ‘Skyrim particle patch’ by Mindflux (download provided) & ‘Realistic Lighting Overhaul’ by The Realistic Lighting Team found here
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450
‘Climates of Tamriel’ edition will follow although it works it just needs a few more tweaks.

I am using most hi-res texture packs and Skyrim floral overhaul
new images, videos and Updates will be uploaded as soon as they are ready.
This ENB was inspired by a classic that is no longer available. 


New World ENB V2.
This is a complete overhaul of Version 1. Please ensure you have the latest ENBseries from Boris and Realistic Lighting Overhaul, I also recommend Enhanced Lights and FX.
GTX 660 / ATI 7850 or above is required to run this ENB.
Let me know what you think if you do try it.
Thank you

NEW WORLD ENB is focused on game effects and visuals.
Realistic effects for
Clouds - Look lighter on top and darker below (see pics)
Day Sky - As realistic looking as possible
Night Sky - As above, dont forget Tamriel has two moons so the night sky should be bright
Candle light effect - Brightness and effect
Fire Smoke - Shaded color and effect depending on surroundings
light reflections - How much light is emitted on to surrounding objects / buildings
Interior Smoke - From fires with light effect and glow
Eye Adaption - Controls how your eye would react to changes in light
Camera FX - Slight glare from bright lights
Window\'s - More realistic with a slight edge glowing of emitting interior / exterior light for effect
Sun & Moon - light effect on the land and buildings

Plus so much more, I have spent a lot of hours so far tweaking this ENB and plan to put many more in to it. I am open to opinions and ideas.

# PLEASE NOTE #
This ENB is very GPU hungry
Turn off Antialiasing and Anisotropic Filtering via Skyrim Options, ENB\'s can take care of this so there is no need for them and it will help with performance.
If your using an LCD TV, run the Color test to ensure your getting the correct visual effects, Links for this are at my download\'s page.
For Ultra shadow\'s & Super high Water reflections effect download my Ultra High End PC ini Settings and follow install description, this ENB will work fine if you choose not to but the effects are pretty impressive if your rig can handle it.

Use the latest Boris Vorontsov ENBSeries found here: http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm
Please note you only need the d3d9.dll from the Boris download, Place that file plus this ENB in to your skyrim folder where the Skyrim TESV file is.

Highly Recommended for full effect:
•Enhanced Lights and FX - Enhanced Lights and FX
•Realistic Lighting Overhaul by Sydney666 and Daemonui

Also using:
The Offical Bethesda High Res Packs
The following Skyrim HD - 2K Textures by NebuLa
Skyrim HD v1_5 FULL - Dungeons
Skyrim HD v1_5 FULL - Landscape
Skyrim HD v1_5 FULL - Misc
Skyrim HD v1_6 FULL - Riften

83Willows 101BugsHD by 83Willow
Pure Waters by Laast
skyROCKS Ultimate standard by Laast
Dramatic Clouds by Anarin
Realistic Smoke and Embers  by isoku
DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99
Mature skin texture and body for UNP by Maevan2
Bones and Skeletons Retexture by Andre7890
Skyrim Flora Overhaul by vurt
SMIM v1-342  (Static Mesh Improvement Mod) by Brumbek

files.name: New World ENB V2_1
files.changelogHtml:
Added FPS limiter to help with performance (disable via 'Shift & Enter' if you dont want it).
Minor tweaks to improve visuals
Fixed sun issue so it looks more natural
See other versions for changelog
